original_text: he said to them, “This is what the Lord has commanded: ‘Tomorrow is a day of solemn rest, a holy Sabbath to the Lord; bake what you will bake and boil what you will boil, and all that is left over lay aside to be kept till the morning.’”
korean_text: 모세가 그들에게 이르되 여호와께서 이같이 말씀하셨느니라 내일은 휴일이니 여호와께 거룩한 안식일이라 너희가 구울 것은 굽고 삶을 것은 삶고 그 나머지는 다 너희를 위하여 아침까지 간수하라

sentences.original_text: This is what the Lord has commanded:
Tomorrow is a day of solemn rest,
a holy Sabbath to the Lord;
and boil what you will boil,
and all that is left over
lay aside to be kept till the morning.’”
